name: Celestial Mishaps
description:
You must save the green Planet from burning up or freezing by pushing the Celestial (Bodies) that would alter its temperature. The objective is to avoid having the thermometer reach either end.

Controls:
Press/Click/Tap anything to push the Celestial away. This only works if they're visible.

Notes:
On each level a Celestial will pass by, which you can push away. You must also take the Planets weather (hot, red or cold, blue) into consideration as it will cause the temperature to fluctuate.

Jam: Prototyped during the Godot Community Game Jam (June 15th-18th 2018).
